about_the_game:
**CURRENTLY WINDOWS ONLY**

An average rage deathrun type of game, with a twist. The name is literal: you can only go straight ahead. No turning back; no going sideways; and to rub extra salt in the wound, no checkpoints.

11 deathrun-like, rage-inducing precision based levels;

Minimalistic but appealing level design and graphics;

Another cool game to your extensive Steam catalogue that you might revisit once in a while.


**BASIC TROUBLESHOOTING**

Please uninstall and reinstall the game if you are facing a bug at the end of Level 4. Sorry.
In general, if there’s any issues that return an error along the lines of “missing executable”, please uninstall and reinstall the game. Sorry, and thank you.
detailed_description:
**CURRENTLY WINDOWS ONLY**

An average rage deathrun type of game, with a twist. The name is literal: you can only go straight ahead. No turning back; no going sideways; and to rub extra salt in the wound, no checkpoints.

11 deathrun-like, rage-inducing precision based levels;

Minimalistic but appealing level design and graphics;

Another cool game to your extensive Steam catalogue that you might revisit once in a while.


**BASIC TROUBLESHOOTING**

Please uninstall and reinstall the game if you are facing a bug at the end of Level 4. Sorry.
In general, if there’s any issues that return an error along the lines of “missing executable”, please uninstall and reinstall the game. Sorry, and thank you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Mojave/10.14
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Macs don’t usually have graphics cards, so none needed
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any; as long as it can make beeps
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Big Sur/11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Macs don’t usually have graphics cards, so none needed
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any; as long as it can make beeps

name: Straight Ahead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can run Steam, you're good
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any; as long as it can make beeps
  • Additional Notes: Not very heavy, almost any modern PC can run it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can run Steam, you're good
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any; as long as it can make beeps
  • Additional Notes: Not very heavy, almost any modern PC can run it
